outline:
1. council, counsel, assembly
    1. council (of familiar conversation)
      1. divan, circle (of familiar friends)
      2. assembly, company
    2. counsel
      1. counsel (itself)
      2. secret counsel
      3. familiar converse, intimacy (with God)
strongs_def: a session, i.e. company of persons (in close deliberation); by implication, intimacy, consultation, a secret
